reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Exit of National Tuberculosis Program of Turkmenistan from the Global Fund support by 2024

description.narrative: Turkmenistan - Tuberculosis - United Nations Development Programme - UNDP Turkmenistan. This program has the following goals: To enable successful transition and strengthen the sustainability of the Global Fund TB grant in Turkmenistan through progressive government co-financing of all key interventions by 2021. The objectives of this program are: To advance policies and capacities for the successful transition to full domestic funding of the TB grant. To ensure the sustainability of universal access to TB prevention, diagnosis and treatment services of good quality and applying patient-centered strategic interventions during the transition period

description.narrative: Living support to client/ target population (LSCTP)

title.narrative: TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Case notification rate of all forms of TB per 100,000 population - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Number of cases of XDR TB enrolled on treatment
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of confirmed RR/MDR-TB cases tested for resistance to second-line drugs
RR-TB and/or MDR-TB prevalence among new TB patients: Proportion of new TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB
